category: news
title: "New artificial intelligence program will be offered at Del Mar College in fall 2021"
excerpt: "College will be offering the first Artificial Intelligence Certificate program in the country for a community college in the fall of 2021. The DMC Computer Science, Engineering and Advanced Technology department will offer its first AI course as part of a 14-hour Level I Certificate program that also supports an Associate in Science in Geographical Information Systems degree."
